title: POC Ventral Lite 180g road bike helmet is their lightest-ever
content:
POC’s new Ventral Lite ultralight road helmet puts their regular Ventral Air Spin on a diet to shave off more than 20% of its weight. Pared back to the safety essentials, it took lot of creative material work to to POC’s lightest-ever cycling helmet, with claimed weights as low as 180g. We’ve been riding with […]
